body_html:
@Prajwal1997
He means

Have I written custom code
OS Platform and Distribution
TensorFlow installed from
TensorFlow version
Bazel version
CUDA/cuDNN version
GPU model and memory
Exact command to reproduce

To solve this problem(ImportError: libcublas.so.8.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory), you can try

sudo vim /etc/profile
export PATH=/usr/local/cuda/bin:$PATH
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
source /etc/profile

If you haven't install cuda8, install it

body:
@Prajwal1997 
He means
> Have I written custom code
OS Platform and Distribution
TensorFlow installed from
TensorFlow version
Bazel version
CUDA/cuDNN version
GPU model and memory
Exact command to reproduce

To solve this problem(ImportError: libcublas.so.8.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory), you can try
```
sudo vim /etc/profile
export PATH=/usr/local/cuda/bin:$PATH
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
source /etc/profile
```
If you haven't install cuda8, install it
